name: finance
spec:
paths:
  /chits:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
              examples:
                chits_json:
                  value:
                    - chitId: A string
                      chitType: A string
                      chitStatus: A string
                      preparationTime: value
                      address: value
          description: Get list of chits
      tags:
        - chits
      operationId: GetFinance
      summary: Get list of chits
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
            examples:
              '1':
                value:
                  chitId: A string
                  chitType: A string
                  chitStatus: A string
                  preparationTime: value
                  address: value
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    chitId: A string
                    chitType: A string
                    chitStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: Changed Finance
      operationId: Post Finance
      summary: Post Finance
    summary: Global operations on chits
  '/chits/{id}':
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    chitId: A string
                    chitType: A string
                    chitStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: chits with specified id
      parameters:
        - examples:
            A string:
              value: A string
          name: id
          description: Finance name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
      operationId: GetFinanceById
      summary: Get Finance by id
      description: Get Finance by id
    patch:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
            examples:
              '1':
                value:
                  chitId: A string
                  chitType: A string
                  chitStatus: A string
                  preparationTime: value
                  address: value
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    chitId: A string
                    chitType: A string
                    chitStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: Changed Finance
      parameters:
        - examples:
            '1':
              value: 1
          name: chitId
          description: Finance name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
      operationId: PatchFinance
      summary: Patch existing Finance
    summary: Specific operation on chits
    parameters:
      - name: id
        description: Finance id
        schema:
          type: string
        in: path
        required: true
  '/chits/{id}/':
    summary: ProvideFinance operation on chits
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                chitId:
                  description: chitId of this ProvideFinance
                  type: string
                chitType:
                  description: chitType of this ProvideFinance
                  type: string
            examples: null
      parameters:
        - name: id
          description: ProvideFinance name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
          examples: null
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Finance'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    chitId: A string
                    chitType: A string
                    chitStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: ProvideFinance Operation
      operationId: ProvideFinance
      summary: ProvideFinance
      description: ProvideFinance
openapi: 3.1.0
components:
  schemas:
    Finance:
      title: Root Type for Finance
      description: The root of the Finance type's schema.
      type: object
      properties:
        chitId:
          description: chitId of this Finance
          type: string
        chitType:
          description: chitType of this Finance
          type: string
        chitStatus:
          description: chitStatus of this Finance
          type: string
        preparationTime:
          description: preparationTime of this Finance
          type: string
        address:
          description: address of this Finance
          type: string
      example:
        chitId: A string
        chitType: A string
        chitStatus: A string
        preparationTime: value
        address: value
tags:
  - name: Finance
    description: Finance resource
info:

  version: 0.0.1
  description: API definition of chit
